mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_spaces (spc_name, spc_cap, spc_image, spc_explain, cop_seq, rsc_seq) VALUES (#{spcName}, #{spcCap}, #{spcImage}, #{spcExplain}, #{copSeq}, #{rscSeq});
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM tb_spaces WHERE spc_seq not in( (select rsv_detail from tb_reservations where #{rsvStart} < rsv_end and rsv_end < #{rsvEnd}) union (select rsv_detail from tb_reservations where #{rsvStart} < rsv_start and rsv_end < #{rsvEnd}) union (select rsv_detail from tb_reservations where #{rsvStart} < rsv_start and rsv_start < #{rsvEnd}) union (select rsv_detail from tb_reservations where #{rsvStart} > rsv_start and rsv_end > #{rsvEnd}) union (select rsv_detail from tb_reservations where #{rsvStart} = rsv_start and rsv_end = #{rsvEnd}))
and cop_seq = ${copSeq} and spc_state = true;
SELECT * FROM tb_spaces WHERE spc_state = true ORDER BY spc_created DESC LIMIT 5 OFFSET 0
SELECT spc_seq, spc_name, spc_cap, spc_image, spc_explain FROM tb_spaces WHERE spc_seq = #{spcSeq};
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_spaces SET spc_name = #{spcName}, spc_cap = #{spcCap}, spc_image = #{spcImage}, spc_explain = #{spcExplain} WHERE spc_seq = #{spcSeq};
